title: Evolving bifacial molecule strategy for surface passivation of lead halide perovskite solar cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01096E, Paper
Nanaki Minoi, Fumitaka Ishiwari, Takuya Omine, Kazuharu Murotani, Ryosuke Nishikubo, Akinori Saeki
We designed new C2- and C3-symmetric molecules for passivating lead halide perovskite solar cells (PSCs). These unique bifacial molecules enable efficient hole transfer, defect passivation, and improved efficiency and stability.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
